html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-02272020-04-03
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Finished Product Testing)
PrecisRegulations amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (FINISHED PRODUCT TESTING) in order to align the current Food and Drug Regulations with the provisions in the Canada-United-States-Mexico Agreement and the Government’s commitment in the Health and Biosciences Sector Regulatory Review Roadmap as part of its regulatory modernization agenda.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0073 Publication Date: 2020-04-29
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Finished Product Testing)
precis: Regulations amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (FINISHED PRODUCT TESTING) in order to align the current Food and Drug Regulations with the provisions in the Canada-United-States-Mexico Agreement and the Government’s commitment in the Health and Biosciences Sector Regulatory Review Roadmap as part of its regulatory modernization agenda.
